tool_description: API for decoding IMEI number more than 16 000 000 items
name: Imei Decoding
title: Imei Decoding

api_list.name: /api/imei/{imei}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kist-imei-decoding-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/imei/353055091379880"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kist-imei-decoding-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kist-imei-decoding-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/imei/{imei}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kist-imei-decoding-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
